name: All of my Tomorrows
description:
"Will you be with me for all of my tomorrows?"

You embark on a world-wide trip with Daniel Wright, the most important person in your life, for the journey of a lifetime. Destinations chosen specifically for the strange legends attached to them and the magic you may discover, you find yourself reflecting on your time with Daniel as you uncover the beautiful secrets of your ordinary-turned-extraordinary expedition.

From the highest clouds to the deepest waters, you recall the most important times of your life with him. But all journey's have an end, and you fear the day that yours and Daniel's finds it conclusion.

Will you be with him for all of his tomorrows?

The Game

All of my Tomorrows is a short LGBTQ+ themed visual novel about your exotic final journey with your longtime friend and partner Daniel Wright. Work through your past and your present as you recall all the things about your life with Danny that you love as you both attempt to come to terms with the future.

WARNING: game includes brief, "partial" nudity - the female mermaid character does not wear clothing, there is almost no definition, however I'm including the warning just to cover everything.

Additional features include:

- A small, but sweet, original soundtrack

- A 17,500+ word script

- A cute protagonist with 15+ expressions, and 10+ poses

- 15+ unique, hand drawn 2D backgrounds

- A handful of flavorful side characters, from monotone fairies to gruff lizardmen

- A fully voice acted experience

- A secret "true" ending to be discovered

A submission for Yaoi Game Jam 2021 & SuNoFes 2021.
